response.original_title: 心霊vs人間 中部縦断コールドウォー編
response.overview: This is the second horror documentary in which Getty, Ryua, Shizuku Hoshino, and ZeNrA, who enjoy absolute popularity among young people on the Internet video distribution service, take on terrifying haunted places. The film is packed with real footage of obsession, including carefully selected ghost images by Getty and bizarre phenomena from the previous film.
response.title: Psychic vs. Human: Chubu Vertical Cold War Edition

titles.title: Psychic vs Human: Chūbu Jūdan Kōrudou-hen
